document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the genus Drasteria of Central Asia and Kazakhstan with special attention to the adjacent areas (Lepidoptera: Erebidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of the genus Drasteria of Central Asia and Kazakhstan with special attention to the adjacent areas (Lepidoptera: Erebidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Habitat ( Figs. 308, 310–312 , 315, 317, 318, 320 ). High-mountainous and middle-mountainous species, inhabit steppes and dry meadows with rocks and stones (mostly stony slopes). Elevation: 2000–3800 m .
Distribution . Middle Asiatic mountains, Saur and Tarbagatai, Dzhungaria and Boro-Khoro, chinese part of Tian-Shan.

Material examined (in total: 105 specimens ).
